attributes.action: To remove the right for police officers to confiscate photographic equipment under section 43 of the terrorism act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Met clarification has recently asked police (wishing to stop and search) to use section 43 of the terrorism act rather than act 44. Following a recent British Journal of Photography publication, stating that under act 43 police are able to confiscate photographic equipment without a court order. We the undersigned petition for an amendement to the act ensuring that all photographic, video and audio recording equipment can only be confiscated with an appropriate court order.
